operations.description: Registers the subscription for the Chaos Resource Provider and enables the creation of Chaos resources.
operations.name: Microsoft.Chaos/register/action

operations.description: Unregisters the subscription for the Chaos Resource Provider and enables the creation of Chaos resources.
operations.name: Microsoft.Chaos/unregister/action

operations.description: Creates or update a Target resource that extends a tracked resource.
operations.name: Microsoft.Chaos/targets/write

operations.description: Deletes a Target resource that extends a tracked resource.
operations.name: Microsoft.Chaos/targets/delete

operations.description: Gets all Targets that extend a tracked resource.
operations.name: Microsoft.Chaos/targets/read

operations.description: Creates or update a Capability resource that extends a Target resource.
operations.name: Microsoft.Chaos/targets/capabilities/write

operations.description: Deletes a Capability resource that extends a Target resource.
operations.name: Microsoft.Chaos/targets/capabilities/delete

operations.description: Gets all Capabilities that extend a Target resource.
operations.name: Microsoft.Chaos/targets/capabilities/read

operations.description: Creates or updates a Chaos Experiment resource in a resource group.
operations.displayName: Creates or updates a Chaos Experiment.
operations.name: Microsoft.Chaos/experiments/write

operations.description: Deletes a Chaos Experiment resource in a resource group.
operations.name: Microsoft.Chaos/experiments/delete

operations.description: Gets all Chaos Experiments in a resource group.
operations.name: Microsoft.Chaos/experiments/read

operations.description: Starts a Chaos Experiment to inject faults.
operations.name: Microsoft.Chaos/experiments/start/action

operations.description: Cancels a running Chaos Experiment to stop the fault injection.
operations.name: Microsoft.Chaos/experiments/cancel/action

operations.description: Gets all TargetTypes.
operations.name: Microsoft.Chaos/locations/targetTypes/read

operations.description: Gets all CapabilityType.
operations.name: Microsoft.Chaos/locations/targetTypes/capabilityTypes/read

operations.description: Read the available SKUs for Chaos Studio.
operations.name: Microsoft.Chaos/skus/read

operations.description: Read the available Operations for Chaos Studio.
operations.name: Microsoft.Chaos/operations/read

operations.description: Gets an Operation Status.
operations.name: Microsoft.Chaos/locations/operationStatuses/read

operations.description: Gets an Operation Result.
operations.name: Microsoft.Chaos/locations/operationResults/read

operations.description: Gets all chaos experiment executions for a given chaos experiment.
operations.name: Microsoft.Chaos/experiments/executions/read

operations.description: Gets details of a chaos experiment execution for a given chaos experiment.
operations.displayName: Gets details of a Chaos Experiment execution.
operations.name: Microsoft.Chaos/experiments/executions/getExecutionDetails/action
